info.brief_description: You come across a special gun which lets you possess the body of anyone you like.
info.description:
Who are you?

Youâre just a normal perverted boy named Johnny Thompson. In between going to school, playing football and hanging with your friends you donât get up to much. However that was all to change when one Friday night you make a miraculous purchase that opens up your world to all sorts of mischievous sexual hijinks and opportunities. This purchase was the âPossession Gunâ a mysterious device that allows you to possess the body of anybody you please.

How does the gun work?

- Shooting a victim with the gun will cause them to freeze in place, turning them into an empty husk for a minimum and maximum of 12 hours. In this state they are unaware of anything going on so you can do with them as you please. Alternatively, in this âhuskâ state you can phase yourself into their frozen body by simply thinking about doing so and stepping literally into their body and taking over control of what was once theirs.
- Each possession lasts a maximum of 12 hours however control of the victimâs body can be released simply by thinking about leaving their body. At which point you will phase out of them. However, they will remain frozen in place until the 12-hour time limit of the Possession Gun is up. Therefore, once a victim has been shot either you are them, or they are a frozen husk. When they are a husk anybody is able to take over their body simply by thinking about taking over it and walking into it.
- When in control of a target you do not have access to any of their memories or mannerisms and will be completely in charge of controlling their body.
- Once the 12-hour time limit is up you will be ejected from their form and if conscious at the time of ejection they will snap straight back to life. The magic of the gun ensure they are unaware and unsuspicious of any time lost as a result of the Possession Gun.
- You can possess a person whilst wearing another personâs body. If the timer is up for a possessed person who you possessed another person whilst wearing they will suddenly phase out of you.
- Upgrades can be bought from the gun catalogue though they are generally pricey.

Characters:

- Johnny Thompson (You): Youâre a slightly below average 16-year-old boy, in year 11 at high school. You have a nice way about you but can be mischievous at times. Due to your poor athleticism and average looks you get picked on by those looking for someone to torment, mainly Ed. Your have three best friends; Sam, James, and Travis who you share your passions for Fortnite, football, and big breasted women. Youâre about 6 foot 1 and a bit lanky, with blue eyes and short brown hair which you sweep over to the side.

- Tracy Thompson: Your 43-year-old mother. Works at an office in the local town though youâre not actually sure what she does. She is a kind lady however she can be stern when she wants to be. She is relatively short and slightly pudgy, has dark brown shoulder length hair and greeny-blue eyes. She had a pretty but plain face which was lucky for you, meaning that your friends didnât wind you up unlike with Samâs MILF of a mom who you all regarded as the best MILF of all time.

- Matt Thompson: Your 45-year-old dad. A tall, burly man standing at about 6ft 4in, which is where you inherited your height. He was usually quite busy at work, though he owned his own business so got to decide when he wanted to work. That seemed like all the time and you very rarely got to hang out or have fun with your dad.

- James Anderson: One of your three best friends. He was the good looking confident one of your group. Tall and well-built with wavy blonde hair he had a few girls fancy him even if he was too scared to pursue them.

- Sam Judd: One of your three best friends. He was a little bit of a prankster, still reasonably looking he could come off as quite irritating. Like marmite people either love him or hate him.

- Travis Peters: One of your three best friends. He was kind of the runt of the group, he was a little bit overweight and you sometimes wound him up about it, it was only playful banter though, if anyone else said anything to him then you always had his back.

- Megan Bennett: A girl from your school of whom youâve had a crush on for at least two years. She didnât mind speaking to you though interactions with her were few and far between since she hung with the popular girl group who really werenât fond of you and your friends. She was beautiful with long blonde hair and a slim, athletic figure.

- Mrs. Ward: Youâre strict English teacher. A tall stern mature woman, probably in her 40âs, with a thick curvy body. She had for some reason taken a mean disliking to you.
